desc: Opens a new terminal in the context of the currently active workspace.
Runs the active file in the terminal.
Scrolls down the terminal viewport within Visual Studio Code.
Scrolls down the terminal viewport by a page.
Scrolls the terminal view to the bottom, making the most recent output visible.
Scrolls up in the integrated terminal within Visual Studio Code.
Scrolls the terminal output up by one page.
Scrolls the terminal output to the top.
Clears the current selection in the integrated terminal.
Focuses the find widget in the integrated terminal.
Hides the find widget in the integrated terminal.
Toggles the option to use regular expressions in the terminal's find widget.
Clears the terminal output in Visual Studio Code.
